title: Microsoft Word 2.0 for Windows. V.2. Intermediate and advanced skills
brief_description: This step-by-step training video is intended as a follow on to the introductory skills introduced in “Microsoft Word 2.0 for Windows. V.2. Introductory skills”. Narrated by Sheila Swanson, you’ll learn the techniques of advanced formatting, working with graphics, how to mannipulate multiple documents and writing tools, such as spell checking and thesauri.
